subtitleNullable: Online News Popularity: Predicting the popularity of online news articles
descriptionNullable: This dataset contains information about the popularity of articles published on Mashable, a news and entertainment website. The dataset includes a range of features, such as the length of the article, the number of images and videos it contains, the day of the week it was published, and the sentiment and subjectivity of the title. The target variable is the number of shares each article received on social media platforms. The purpose of this dataset is to provide a resource for researchers and data scientists to analyze and understand the factors that influence the popularity of online content.
title: Online News Popularity

The dataset includes a range of features, such as the length of the article, the number of images and videos it contains, the day of the week it was published, and the sentiment and subjectivity of the title. The target variable is the number of shares each article received on social media platforms. The purpose of this dataset is to provide a resource for researchers and data scientists to analyze and understand the factors that influence the popularity of online content.
